page.description: Properties and methods in the CSS::CSS3BoxShadow Class.

property.name: inset
property.description:
Type: "L",
Shadow is inset (draw inside the element instead of project outside the element)

property.name: horizontal
property.description:
Type: "C",
horizontal width of the shadow.

property.name: vertical
property.description:
Type: "C",
vertical height of the shadow.

property.name: spread
property.description:
Type: "C",
Spread of shadow (for shadows that are larger than the associated elements) - i.e. long shadow - expressed as size.

methodref.name: FromString
methodref.description: Populate a box shadow from a compact definition.

methodref.name: ToString
methodref.description: Return compact definition for a box shadow.

methodref.description: Create a new object instance of the same type.
